Other Information.Additional Info: The relatively small-sized dye methylene blue was selectively adsorbed by JLNU-4 due to the size-exclusion effect.

Other Information.Test Conditions: Ambient conditions, column-chromatographic separation in DMA solution
Other Information.Additional Info: Congo red was excluded by the pores of JLNU-4 during column-chromatographic separation.

Experimental Validation.Performance Metrics: Complete and rapid adsorption of methylene blue; successful separation of methylene blue from congo red

Other Information.Additional Info: JLNU-4 is a multifunctional microporous MOF that also shows excellent iodine adsorption both in solution and vapor phases.
